p: Once a generic framework that could be applied to vaccine R&D broadly was established, the working group undertook a series of meetings applying the process map to three case studies of different vaccine candidates under development for three of the UKVN’s priority pathogens: MERS Viral Vector vaccine, Zika protein subunit/VLP vaccine ( Fig. 3 ), and the Prokarium Vaxonella® Plague vaccine ( Fig. 4 ). The case studies can be accessed through the main landing page of the process map 2.
